data.title: ECLIPS3D: Linear wave and circulation calculations
data.name: ECLIPS3D
data.description: Public code for linear wave and circulation calculations, developed originally for planetary atmospheres.

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "3) run - contains the input files and the exe file created by bin."
"Public Fortran 90 code for linear wave and circulation calculations, developed originally for planetary atmospheres, with python scripts provided for data analysis."

"This README aims at describing the code and how to use it. Simple examples are provided." and detailed run instructions (compile with Makefile, run mpirun, then analyze outputs) indicate it is an end-user simulation/analysis code.
